hioa.android.chess

Class Chesspiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • hioa.android.chess.Chesspiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, EnPassant, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Chesspiece
extends Object
    Superclass for the various Chesspieces

    Note: This is an abstract class

    Version:
    2013-11-10
    Author:
    Lars Sætaberget

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mColor

        private int mColor

      • mCurrentColumn

        private int mCurrentColumn
        This variable is only used for allowing the pieces to easily orient themselves on the board. It is used to determine legal moves and which positions they threaten.

        The values for all other pieces in the same methods are derived from the current board state in Chessboard

      • mCurrentRow

        private int mCurrentRow
        This variable is only used for allowing the pieces to easily orient themselves on the board. It is used to determine legal moves and which positions they threaten.

        The values for all other pieces in the same methods are derived from the current board state in Chessboard

        See Also:

      • getColor

        public int getColor()

      • getColumn

        protected int getColumn()
        Get the column that this piece is currently positioned at
        Returns:
        The column position for this piece

      • getRow

        protected int getRow()
        Get the row that this piece is currently positioned at
        Returns:
        The row position for this piece

      • legalMoves

        public abstract boolean[][] legalMoves()
        Provides an array of all legal moves for this piece
        Returns:
        A 2d boolean array representing the chessboard where all legal moves are true and all illegal moves are false

      • move

        public abstract boolean move(int row,
           int column)
        Moves the piece to the provided row and column
        Parameters:
        row - The row to move to
        column - The column to move to
        Returns:
        False if the move is illegal

      • sameClass

        public abstract boolean sameClass(Chesspiece piece)
        Checks whether or not the provided piece is the same class as this piece
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to check
        Returns:
        True if the provided piece is of the same lowest instance as this piece

      • setColor

        protected void setColor(int color)

      • setColumn

        protected boolean setColumn(int column)
        Sets the current column for this chesspiece
        Parameters:
        column - The new column index
        Returns:
        False if the index is illegal

      • setRow

        protected boolean setRow(int row)
        Sets the current row for this chesspiece
        Parameters:
        row - The new row index
        Returns:
        False if the index is illegal

      • threatensPosition

        public abstract boolean threatensPosition(int row,
                        int column)
        Used to determine whether or not this piece is currently checking the opposing king.
        Parameters:
        row - The row that the opposing king is on
        column - The column that the opposing king is on
        Returns:
        True if this piece is threatening the given position
